com.gensym.dlg
Interface StandardDialogClient

public interface StandardDialogClient

An interface for notifications of command events generated by the buttons on a StandardDialog. An instance of an implementation of this interface is passed to the constructor of a StandardDialog, which then map action events on all buttons generated for the dialog to calls to the dialogDismissed method of the StandardDialogClient. The listener can implement application specific logic in the callback to respond to the event.

Method Summary
 void dialogDismissed(StandardDialog d, int cmdCode)
          The method that is called when a command button on a StandardDialog is activated by the user
